text: what's the secret to a moist juicy
flavorful turkey burger no more than
shops red onions and mustard I'm gonna
add a quarter cup of chopped red onion
to one pound of turkey meat ground 1
tablespoon Dijon mustard 1 teaspoon of
coarse salt when I'm mixing burger
mixture want to make sure to not over
process it so using two forks is really

raw and they release moisture when the

nice and juicy the Dijon mustard is not
only adding a really nice Tang but it
also helps tenderize the knife so we are

to divide my mixture in half and then
sort of eyeball it that way you end up
with nice even portions this looks good
now this is a pretty soft mixture so
this is gonna chill for 30 minutes in
